ygData.subject: Re: Rune Sword
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are going to get a magician to summon the sword for you, you may as well get them to summon another weapon. I have a magician friend who summons all
ygData.messageBody:
If you are going to get a magician to summon the sword for you, you may as
well get them to summon another weapon. I have a magician friend who summons
all cool types of weapons. From a spear that casts the occasional ward
undead to a sword that casts healing.

> ----------
> From: John Merkle[SMTP:rjak@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 12:49 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Rune Sword
>
> From: "John Merkle" <rjak@...>
>
> Leri The same thing happended to me in Faydak but my other sowrd was there
> with my corpse
>
